description: No summer spread is complete without an egg salad. Make the best creamy egg salad with this easy recipe. It's great as a side or a light lunch.
name: Easy Egg Salad Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Add celery, onion and dill to egg. Spoon a little of the mayonnaise mixture onto plates and spoon on egg mixture. Drizzle with oil, sprinkle with paprika and serve with remaining mayonnaise mixture.
